metadata.name: Just juice #1
metadata.description: We are pioneers in the juice industry in the Middle East and we want to create an evolution in the world of NFT and combine reality and augmented reality by transferring reality to our digital world and it will be as follows - 50% of the company puts the value of shares represented in 10,000 NFT each share equals one NFT image. The community can invest through our project and distribute profits every 6 months. Thus, we have achieved the desire to continue the success of the project and not just leave it in the hands of the digital community. We also achieved company advertising and investor knowledge through the digital world before we opened our branches in the rest of the world.
